title: How Pay Transparency Is Changing the Job Search
description:
More states are requiring companies to post salary information as part of job listings. Host J.R. Whalen is joined by reporter Ray A. Smith to discuss the questions that job candidates should still be asking about pay, and by California resident and current job seeker Paris Clarke to discuss how the additional information is helping her search for a job.
